title: Simplify Development Task Cards by Removing Redundant Elements
description: As a project manager, I want to remove Branch, PR status, and Rebase links from Development Task cards so that the interface is clean and focused on essential actions.
iWant: to remove Branch, PR status, and Rebase links from Development Task cards
soThat: the interface is clean and focused on essential actions
acceptanceCriteria: Given a Development Task card is displayed, when rendered, then Branch link is not visible
Given the card layout, when viewed, then PR created and ready for development text is removed
Given task actions, when displayed, then Rebase button is not present
